mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tt_shopcart (USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, count, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tt_shopcart set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SHOPCART_ID = #{shopcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select SHOPCART_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, count, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by from tt_shopcart where SHOPCART_ID = #{shopcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select SHOPCART_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, count, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by from tt_shopcart
